alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:37PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grant, northwestern Jefferson, east central Saline and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 236 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mabelvale, or near Southwest Little Rock, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Redfield... Otter Creek... Cane Creek... Ironton... East End... Orion... Sweet Home... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... State Fairgrounds... Alexander... Baseline... Higgins... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
